0010101010010000 0110000110010110 0 -> sum: 1000110000100110, cout: 0
0011101110011101 1011010010111111 1 -> sum: 1111000001011101, cout: 0
0000001011110100 0101001011011101 1 -> sum: 0101010111010010, cout: 0
0001100001110011 0011110010101101 0 -> sum: 0101010100100000, cout: 0
0110100011011110 1100011101100011 0 -> sum: 0011000001000001, cout: 1
0001111011111010 1111100000000011 0 -> sum: 0001011011111101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
